author: Qatar Tribune
title: Iraq book last 16 spot with 2-1 win over Japan - Read Qatar Tribune on the go for unrivalled news coverage
text:
AL RAYYAN: Iraq booked their place in the last 16 of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023as two first-half goals from Ayman Hussein earned Jesus Casas’ side a 2-1 win over four-time champions Japan in the second round of Group E matches at Education City Stadium on Friday.
Hussein netted with headers at either end of a first half dominated by a vibrant Iraqi side, who rekindled memories of the nation’s historic 2007 AFC Asian Cup-winning side in front of a vociferous, partisan crowd.
Casas’ team established the foundations of their success early in the game, unsettling the Japanese with their industry in midfield and reaped the rewards inside the first five minutes.
Takumi Minamino’s misplaced pass from the left touchline in the fourth minute fell at the feet of Ali Jasim and his long range effort was unconvincingly slapped away by Zion Suzuki.
Less than a minute later the Iraqis were ahead and again Suzuki was involved, the goalkeeper palming Jasim’s centre squarely onto the head of Hussein, and he powered the ball into the top corner.
The win means Iraq, who have six points after starting their campaign with a 3-1 victory over Indonesia, are guaranteed to advance no matter the result of their final Group E game against Vietnam on Wednesday.
The Japanese were rattled and took time to find their rhythm. Hiroki Ito’s weak shot from close range was straight into the arms of Jalal Hassan while Wataru Endo’s attempted overhead kick was well off target.
The Samurai Blue’s best opportunity of the half came in the 32nd minute when Takefusa Kubo picked up possession near the centre circle and played a quick pass forward to Takuma Asano.
The Japanese were to regret not making more of that opening four minutes into injury time as Iraq doubled their lead.
Ahmed Yahya drove past Yukinari Sugawara near the right touchline before surging into the penalty area to deliver a cross that Hussein headed in after outmuscling Shogo Taniguchi in the six yard box.
But, rather than find the hard charging Junya Ito at the far post to score, Asano’s own effort on goal went harmlessly into the stands.
Rebin Ghareeb denied Asano a goal scoring opportunity – and in the process survived a VAR penalty review by referee Khaled Al Turais – as Japan switched Junya Ito to the left in the second half to try to unlock the defence, with the Reims winger finding space to exploit.
Ko Itakura headed over the bar and substitute Ritsu Doan’s free-kick was too high while Mohannad Ali almost hit a third for Iraq at the other end when his low strike flew across Suzuki’s goal.
And while captain Endo scored with a header three minutes into injury time to give the Japanese hope, Iraq’s win was well deserved.
 Copy 19/01/2024 30

author: Reuters
title: Ukrainian Catholic church says document on blessing same-sex couples does not apply
text:
FILE PHOTO: Kiev’s Archbishop Sviatoslav Shevchuk leads a news conference on the recent events in the Ukrainian capital, at the Vatican radio headquarters in Rome February 25, 2014. REUTERS/Max Rossi/File Photo
The head of Ukraine’s eastern-rite Catholic church on Saturday said a document endorsed by Pope Francis this week permitting blessings for same-sex couples did not apply to his church and its teachings.
Major Archbishop Sviatoslav Shevchuk said the Vatican document “interprets the pastoral meaning of blessings in the Latin Church” but made no reference to issues governing the eastern, or Greek Catholic, church.
ADVERTISEMENT “Thus … this Declaration applies solely to the Latin Church and has no legal force for the faithful of the Ukrainian Greek Catholic Church,” Shevchuk said in a statement.
FEATURED STORIES NEWSINFO More recantations: Retired cop says raps vs De Lima ‘pure hearsay’ NEWSINFO After 6 years, rail trips resume in Bicol NEWSINFO LIST: Adjusted mall operating hours for holiday season 2023 READ: Vatican approves blessings for same-sex couples in landmark ruling He said a blessing could not be separated from the church’s teachings and “can in no way contradict the teaching of the Catholic Church about the family as a faithful, indissoluble, and fertile union of love between a man and a woman.”
The eastern-rite church worships according to rites similar to the Orthodox faith, but is in communion with Rome by virtue of a 16th century agreement. Repression forced the church underground in Soviet times and it now has about 4.5 million parishioners, or roughly 10% of the population of Ukraine.
The document from the Vatican’s doctrinal office said Roman Catholic priests can administer blessings to same-sex couples as long as they are not part of regular church rituals or liturgies.
READ: EXPLAINER: How can Catholic priests bless same-sex unions? It said such blessings would be a sign that God welcomes all but should not be confused with the sacrament of heterosexual marriage.
Gay rights are making some progress in Ukraine and other ex-Soviet states outside Russia. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy has expressed sympathy for upholding gay rights, though ruling out constitutional changes to allow single-sex marriages while the country is at war.
Your subscription could not be saved. Please try again. Your subscription has been successful.

author: diariouno
title: Seis rutas provinciales sufrieron cortes por las lluvias y crecidas de los ríos
text: Por las intensas lluvias y tormentas ocurridas este miércoles en Mendoza, seis rutas provinciales quedaron intransitables. Así lo informaron desde la Dirección Provincial de Vialidad. Las rutas más afectadas son la N°13, en Uspallata, un tramo de la RP 86 Luján -Tupungato, la RP 89 de Potrerillos - El Salto, la RP 173, Cañón del Atuel a El Nihuil y la RP 179 y 190 en Punta de Agua, San Rafael. Todos los cortes se debieron a la crecida de los ríos y arroyos aluvionales.

author: @dzerzhinskiy.regions
title: Заморозки и дожди в Подмосковье могут испортить атмосферу шашлыков на майских праздниках | Общество | Селдон Новости
text:
Синоптик Ильин : заморозки до -2 градусов ожидаются в Подмосковье 8 мая
Фото: Марат Алиев Праздничные выходные в Подмосковье , в том числе и в Дзержинском , могут испортить неблагоприятные погодные условия. По прогнозам синоптиков, температура воздуха ночью, 8 мая, может опустится до -2 градусов, а 9 мая — до -5 градусов.
Синоптик прогностического центра «Метео» Александр Ильин предупреждает, что в первую половину наступивших праздников возможны осадки в виде дождя и прохладная погода. Днем столбики термометров не поднимутся выше отметки в +17 градусов. Местами и вовсе остановятся на +8, +10 градусах. Также может образоваться туман.
В субботу, 9 мая, будет облачно с прояснениями. Днем возможен небольшой дождь.
«Температура воздуха в Подмосковье ночью будет колебаться от 0 до +3 градусов, местами будут заморозки до -5 градусов. Днем столбики термометров покажут от +8 до +13 градусов. Ветер западный и северо-западный со скоростью 5-10 метров в секунду», — сообщает Ильин
В воскресенье, 11 мая, погода не изменится. Буде также облачно с прояснениями и небольшими дождями. Днем температура воздуха прогреется не больше + 14 градусов.
Ранее синоптики не ждать теплой погоды в Подмосковье до середины мая.
Данные о правообладателе фото и видеоматериалов взяты с сайта «REGIONS.RU / Дзержинский» , подробнее в Правилах сервиса Источник: REGIONS.RU / Дзержинский Темы: Экология

author: Redacción
title: Una alfombra de serrín de 60 metros atraviesa el Paseo de Almería
text:
El Paseo de Almería se ha transformado, en la jornada de este sábado, en una de las calles de Tíjola que cada día 12 de mayo luce sus mejores galas para recibir a su Patrona, la Virgen de Fátima. El pueblo del Valle del Almanzora ha realizado una alfombra de serrín de 60 metros de longitud en la arteria principal de la capital almeriense para poner en valor su festividad, reconocida de Interés Turístico de Andalucía el pasado año 2023, y extrapolar su valor y riqueza a nivel provincial.
La alcaldesa de Almería, María del Mar Vázquez, acompañada por el concejal de Turismo, Comunicaciones y Promoción de la Ciudad, Joaquín Pérez de la Blanca, ha visitado esta mañana esta manifestación artística en compañía también del alcalde de Tíjola, José Juan Martínez, de la diputada María del Mar López y del coordinador del Instituto Andaluz de la Juventud, Diego Martínez.
La regidora ha reconocido que “hoy estamos aquí para apoyar esta iniciativa que tiene por objetivo poner en valor tradiciones y culturas de otros municipios en nuestra ciudad. Si hace unas semanas disfrutamos de una de las fiestas más conocidas del panorama nacional, las fallas de Valencia, ahora es el turno de una fiesta reconocida en toda nuestra comunidad autónoma, las alfombras de serrín de la Virgen de Fátima de Tíjola”.
Vázquez ha recordado que “estamos encantados de ser ciudad receptora de tradiciones y cultura de otros lugares. Siempre tenemos los brazos abiertos para todo el que quiera y con un municipio hermano, como sois vosotros, no podía ser menos”. La alcaldesa ha finalizado animando a todos los presentes “a disfrutar de nuestra ciudad, de nuestra cultura, de nuestro patrimonio y de nuestros museos, sin olvidaros de nuestra gastronomía”.
Por su parte, la diputada provincial María del Mar López ha puesto de relieve "el firme e indispensable compromiso que tiene la Diputación Provincial con todo lo que tiene que ver con la historia, raíces, cultura, tradiciones y fiestas almerienses. Y lo tiene porque uno de nuestros grandes objetivos como institución reside en defender, difundir y divulgar aquello que nos hace únicos y diferentes como nuestra forma de entender la vida o las celebraciones tan genuinas como la de la Virgen de Fátima de Tíjola. Esta actividad hermana a Tïjola con toda la provincia anticipando sus fiestas".
Entre tanto, el alcalde de Tíjola y diputado, José Juan Martínez, ha dado las gracias a la alcaldesa de Almería por haber colaborado en hacer realidad "que hayamos podido presentar las alfombras de Tíjola a todos los almerienses". Además, ha extendido ese agradecimiento a la Junta de Andalucía y la Diputación Provincial por su apoyo para conseguir la Declaración de Interés Turístico de Andalucía de esta festividad. Por último, Martínez ha destacado que la alfombra realizada hoy en Almería se ha elaborado con la misma técnica que las que hacen en Tíjola con figuras geométricas con tres detalles que representan a la provincia, a Almería capital y a Tíjola. "Nuestra fiesta es una gran convivencia vecinal de todos los barrios, una convivencia intergeneracional que representa nuestra identidad", ha afirmado.
Por último, el coordinador del IAJ, Diego Martínez, ha reconocido que “para la Junta de Andalucía la celebración de la Festividad de la Virgen de Fátima en Tíjola no es una fiesta más, ni mucho menos, y prueba de ello, es que el pasado mes de septiembre la Junta de Andalucía la declaró Fiesta de Interés Turístico de Andalucía, poniéndose de manifiesto su especial importancia como recurso turístico andaluz”. “Hoy su alcalde ha querido traernos esta celebración a la capital, una alfombra de 60 metros, para que todos los almerienses podamos conocer algo más de esta festividad, y que esta alfombra sea un reclamo para que visitemos Tíjola el próximo fin de semana, concretamente el domingo, pero hay la alfombra ya será de kilómetro y medio”, ha finalizado.
Durante la jornada, el Ayuntamiento de Tíjola ha ofrecido la bebida tradicional de la localidad (la cuerva) y una gran paella. Además, se han instalado distintos puestos de la marca gourmet de Diputación, Sabores Almería, y del Valle del Almanzora, para degustar la más variada y rica gastronomía de la provincia además de sus productos de cercanía.
Hay que recordar que estas fiestas destacan por sus elementos de turismo etnográfico, poniendo de relieve el valioso patrimonio cultural de la región. La celebración consiste en vestir las calles por donde discurre la Virgen con una impresionante alfombra de más de kilómetro y medio de serrín tintado. Los elaborados adornos, la participación activa de la comunidad y la singular procesión hacen de esta fiesta una experiencia única, atrayendo a ella a visitantes de toda España.
Durante toda la jornada, los comercios del Almanzora han ofrecido una pequeña degustación de roscos y buñuelos tradicionales. Todo el evento, además, ha sido amenizado con música en directo.

author: CBCP News
title: Archbishop calls for halt to mining in Zambo del Sur
text:
A Catholic archbishop is calling for a halt to all mining operations in the southern Philippine province of Zamboanga del Sur, which have been ongoing for decades.
Archbishop Martin Jumoad, apostolic administrator of the Diocese of Pagadian, said the move is necessary to prevent the “disastrous effects” of mining in the mineral-rich province.
“I advocate for a moratorium on all forms of mining in our province,” Jumoad said in a recent pastoral letter. “Our common home, the environment, is being gradually destroyed.”
The archbishop expressed concern over the rise of illegal mining activities and “unprecedented” applications in the province.
He identified at least nine towns where mining is active: Dumingag, Mahayag, Midsalip, Bayog, Pitogo, Dimataling, Tabina, and Tigbao.
“Let us stay aware and take action to protect our environment and communities from the devastating impacts of mining,” he said.
Jumoad appealed to government leaders and agencies to help stop and prevent the influx of illegal mining. He also called for a comprehensive assessment of mining’s overall impacts before granting new permits.
Last month, people from various parishes, including some priests, staged a picket in Dumingag to voice their opposition to illegal mining.
“We need to remain vigilant to avoid facing the same disastrous effects of mining that have occurred in other locations,” Jumoad said.
Zamboanga del Sur is host to minerals like gold, silver and iron ore.

author: @englishjagrannews
title: Flights, Train Services Hit In Delhi, Other States Due To Dense Fog; Airlines Issue Advisories
text:
- By
[Aditya Jha](/authors/aditya-jha) - Published: Fri, 03 Jan 2025 09:37 AM (IST)
- Source:JND
Amid dense fog and light rain in Northern States, including Delhi, several of the flights and trains have been delayed. The dense fog has led to a significant dip in temperature and has also reduced the visibility in these areas. The India Meteorological Department (IMD) on Friday stated that Delhiites might experience light rainfall in upcoming days, and the temperature over the city recorded a maximum temperature of 16 degrees Celsius and a minimum of 7.6 degrees Celsius in the last 24 hours.
Delhi Airport, in a passenger advisory, informed the passengers about the disruptions and instructed them to contact the concerned airline for updates in flight information before the journey. "While landings and take-offs continue at Delhi Airport, flights that are not CAT III compliant may get affected," the advisory stated.
ALSO READ: [Delhi Weather Update: Dense Fog Affects Visibility, IMD Issues Orange Alert](https://english.jagran.com/india/delhi-ncr-weather-update-dense-fog-affects-visibility-imd-predicts-further-temperature-dip-orange-alert-video-10210299)
Earlier on Thursday, FlightRadar24 informed that the flights of SpiceJet, IndiGo, and Air India were affected as the average delay of flights in the capital city was five minutes for arrival flights and 11 minutes for departure flights. In one of its advisories, SpiceJet clarified that incoming and outgoing flights in Amritsar and Guwahati "may get affected" due to the poor weather conditions. The airline further urged the passengers to stay updated.
The airline also changed the flight schedules for Srinagar and Chandigarh due to the poor weather. It advised the passengers in Delhi, Bengaluru, and Lucknow to go through the flight status due to heavy fog in these cities. "Please allow extra time when travelling to the airport, as reduced visibility might affect vehicle movement," the advisory added. Air India also issued a similar advisory, requesting the passengers to stay updated about the timings of their flights.
ALSO READ: [Noida School Holidays: DM Orders School Closure For Class 1 To 8 From January 3 Till THIS Date Amid Dense Fog | Check Details](https://english.jagran.com/uttar-pradesh/noida-schools-closed-dm-orders-school-closure-for-class-1-to-8-from-january-3-till-this-date-amid-dense-fog-check-details-10210234)
Apart from the flight services, train services also got affected due to the bad weather. The IMD has issued a warning for dense fog for several states, including Delhi, Rajasthan, Punjab, and Haryana. Several cities like Lucknow, Bengaluru, Amritsar, and Guwahati are also expected to face fog in the upcoming days.

author: 网易
title: 2025高考状元大洗牌：河南与湖南的传统强校均颗粒无收，太意外！|名校|高中|县一中|湖南省|河南省_网易订阅
text:
高考，从来都不只是一场考试，它更像是一场没有硝烟的战争，充满了变数与奇迹。
今年河南和湖南的高考状元就是最好的例子！
近日，河南与湖南高考成绩纷纷放榜，历来都是两大高考大省格外受关注，郑州，信阳，长沙等地市的名校，以前都被称作是状元的摇篮，没想到今年竟都意外的“颗粒无收”！
而那些曾经辉煌过，现在一度被认为“没落”了的百年老校，今年都纷纷逆风翻盘，强势地站起来了！
河南开封高中强势崛起，郑州信阳颗粒无收
河南历来被称作“高考难省”，今年有90万考生过独木桥，所有的目光都聚焦在郑州的大三甲：郑州外国语、省实验、郑州一中
信阳的双子星：信阳高中、光山二高身上，就在大家都以为状元笔触在这5所高中之内时，结果却出乎所有人意料之外
物理类状元： 来自 开封高中， 裸分 724分！ 更惊人的是，全省第二名（723分）同样出自该校！
历史类状元 ：来自 济源一中 ，裸分 693 分！
开封高中，是创办于1902年的百年名校，曾是无数河南学子心中的圣地。但近些年，清北录取人数一度跌至个位数，被许多人叹息"没落了"。
可谁能想到，在2025年这个首个新高考年份，它用一个状元、一个榜眼的成绩，向全省宣告： 开高，回来了！站起来了！
而济源一中，一个来自" 存在感很低 "的县级市的 王牌中学 ，也用一枚沉甸甸的 历史类状元 桂冠，证明了英雄不问出处的道理。
网友评价：看到开封高中站起来真的有点泪目，不容易啊！这才是高考的魅力所在，状元不问强校，给那些默默努力的学校和学生点赞！
湖南长沙4大名校竟折戟，岳阳一中创奇迹
如果说河南的教育是多点开花，那湖南的教育，几乎就是长沙的一骑绝尘。长沙四大名校：长郡、雅礼、师大附中、长沙一中每年为清北输送超200人，几乎垄断了全省70%的顶尖生源。
大家都以为，今年会和往常一样，状元之争不过是四大名校的之间击鼓传花。
但高考，就是充满了变数与奇迹！
物理类状元 ：来自岳阳市 岳阳一中 的 蒲仁智 同学，裸分 717 分！
历史类状元 ：来自常德市 澧县一中 的 文哲骏 同学，裸分 681 分！
结果一出，大家都有些错愕，虽说岳阳一中是一所拥有122年历史的老校，但是20年几乎与状元无缘，一度陷入低迷。
今年，蒲仁智同学力挽狂澜，助力岳阳一中强势登顶，让老年老校岳阳一中也站起来了!
而澧县一中，作为一所县级中学，在常德众多名校中并不算最耀眼，却也凭借实力，摘得桂冠。这背后，是无数个日夜的坚守与付出。
有网友评价：这才是真实的逆袭啊！说明教育资源不能只集中在几个城市，遍地开花才是真的好！为蒲仁智和文哲骏同学点赞，你们是家乡的骄傲！
最后
一场高考，几家欢喜，几家愁。
河南与湖南的状元大洗牌，与其说是传统强校的失利，不如说是那些坚守教育初心，默默耕耘的老师们的胜利。
他们用实际成绩说话，淋漓尽致地诠释了"爱不分学校，强不论名气"这句话。
最后让我们祝贺 开封高中，济源一中，岳阳一中，澧县一中， 也愿每一个默默奋斗的身影，最终都能迎来属于自己的高光时刻！
声明：个人原创，仅供参考
